page.title: 15COMMERCIAL ENTERPRISE:SESSAY
page.content: Because of its situation in lovely North Yorkshire country we have two caravan sites. One, by the Horse- breakers Arms in Hutton Sessay, has a shop and swimming pool. The smaller site is in Sessay and takes touring caravans. Another public house, the Moor and Pheasant, also caters for holiday makers and local people. Allied to farming there is a turkey- breeding farm, a pig farm and a chicken hatchery. We also have a kennels where people can leave their pets for short stays. Other tradesmen include: a dairyman, a thriving repairs garage and a wood- carver making oak furniture. His wife ably assists with the soft furnishing. Another business produces and markets stains and other chemicals used in woodwork. We also have a bookseller and a designer of menswear.
